page.title: 18Take-away Foods
page.content: {KENTUCKY FRIED CHICKEN} Some days my Mum and Dad buy Kentucky Fried Chicken. They always buy a big bucketful because there are six of us. A Kentucky meal consists of one leg of chicken,a portion of chips,and a drink of your choice. The chicken is coated with seasoning. Also in the big bucket you get a hat and a napkin. The shop in on Ball Hill. {FISH AND CHIPS} My favourite food is Fish and Chips. We get ours from Hipswell Highway Saloon. They also sell Roe,Potato Scallops, Sausages,Pies,Pickled Onions and Pork which is expensive. {CHINESE FOOD} I go to th Garden House. They open 12-2p.m.and 5-12midnight every day. My favourite dishes are - Pork Spare Rib,Chicken Fried Rice,King Prawn Chow Mein. They cost about Â£2.00 each.
